Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.fulda.webshop.controller.ProductController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/app/products") public class ProductController extends Object
ProductController manages requests related to product operations in the webshop. It provides endpoints for viewing, adding, filtering, and deleting products.

    • ProductController

      Constructs a ProductController with the specified ProductDetailFacade.
      Parameters:
      productDetailFacade - the facade used to manage product details

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      @GetMapping public String getAllProducts(@RequestParam(required=false) String search, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean edit, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves all products and displays them in the catalog view.
      Parameters:
      search - optional search query to filter products by name
      edit - flag indicating whether to enable edit mode
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to render

    • getProductsByColor

      @GetMapping("/filter_by=color/{color}") public String getProductsByColor(@PathVariable String color, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean edit, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves products filtered by color and displays them in the catalog view.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to filter products by
      edit - flag indicating whether to enable edit mode
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to render

    • getProductById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public String getProductById(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to retrieve details for
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to render, or an error page if not found

    • deleteProduct

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteProduct(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a specific product by its ID and redirects back to the catalog page.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      a redirect URL for navigating back to the products page after deletion

    • getAddProductPage

      @GetMapping("/add") public String getAddProductPage()
      Displays the page for adding a new product.
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for adding a new product

    • addProduct

      @PostMapping public String addProduct(@ModelAttribute Product newProduct)
      Handles adding a new product based on form submission.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - the new Product object submitted from the form
      Returns:
      a redirect URL for navigating to the newly created product's details page

    • getPaginatedProducts

      @GetMapping("/catalog-paginated") public String getPaginatedProducts(@RequestParam(required=false) String search, @PageableDefault(size=3) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves all products with pagination support and displays them in a paginated catalog view.
      Parameters:
      search - optional search query to filter products by name
      pageable - pagination information including page number and size
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for paginated results
